---
title: "Installation of ANOEN"
format: html
---

```{r}
#| label: quick-install-external-test
#| message: true
#| warning: true
#| echo: true
#| include: true
#| eval: true

# Safely unload the namespace

remove.packages("ANOEN")
suppressWarnings(unloadNamespace("ANOEN"))

# Replace the placeholder path with the path to your ANOEN source directory
devtools::install("~/GitHub/ANOEN",
                  upgrade = "never",
                  build = FALSE,
                  args = c("--no-byte-compile", "--no-test-load")
)


```
